title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Fry pancetta. Combine all ingredients and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill chicken. Cook onions and tomatoes with spices to make gravy. Combine and serve.
